title: ‘Keto’ molecule may hamper colorectal cancer growth
content: A molecule the liver produces as a response to low-carb, high-fat "keto" diets helped supress colorectal cancer tumors in mice, researchers report.
description: A molecule the liver produces as a response to low-carb, high-fat "keto" diets helped supress colorectal cancer tumors in mice, researchers report.
